Bsp_Sii9022aHpdParams Struct Reference
External Device Interface API » External Video Encoder API » SII9022A Video Encoder API

Structure for hot plug detection parameters. More...

#include <bsp_sii9022a.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 hpdEvtPending
 
UInt32 busError
 
UInt32 hpdStatus
 

Detailed Description

Structure for hot plug detection parameters.

It is used to get the hpd parameters using IOCTL_BSP_SII9022A_QUERY_HPD ioctl.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_Sii9022aHpdParams::busError

Receiver Sense Event Pending or CTRL Bus Error.

UInt32 Bsp_Sii9022aHpdParams::hpdEvtPending

Hot Plug Connection Event Pending.

UInt32 Bsp_Sii9022aHpdParams::hpdStatus

Hot Plug Pin Current Status.
